name: Operation Rescue: Bunnies
description:
There were a lot of zombies at the medieval lockout, and your girlfriend was trapped. The girl hid in a high-tech shield to protect herself. But it's only a temporary escape. You saved your girlfriend. They bought a lot of weapons and rushed in. How long can you hold on to the zombie siege?
There are more than 10 weapons in the game. They don't have the same power. You need these weapons to fight off zombies and protect your girlfriend. Zombies will constantly attack your girlfriend, and you will have to fight back with weapons. The weapons need constant resupply of ammunition. The captain has given you two privileges, one to boost your girlfriend's health and one to kill most zombies in seconds, so use them.
Game operations:
WSAD moves,F12 sees help,V uses health,M uses bombing. Ammunition is replenished by the wall at the birth place. To the rescue: Bunnies.
More maps and girls are in the works.
Official QQ group :739927074(enter the group benefits, need to contact the group owner);
